item.description:
Inexpensive, different, and very fun night out in much-loved Northampton, MA at the Northampton Center for the Arts. $10.00 in advance includes dinner, dancing AND entertainment. Come alone or bring a friend. Entertainment will include: Evelyn Harris, (formerly of Sweet Honey), "The Hairston House Dancers," Recovery Girls Exotica, Lord Russ does Elvis, Queen Drag and Acrobatic Misfits along with and music to dance to by "NYC House DJ" Byyl Arnold, and other special guests. This annual party raises funds for two Northampton residential drug/alcohol recovery programs, Hairston House for men and Beacon House for women. All hors d'oeuvres, full buffet, and desserts are included in the ticket price. Coffee and other refreshments will be available for purchase. Tickets are $15 at the door. Click on the link below for how to get tickets in advance and other information.

This event will be a go with three other definite "yes" responses by Thursday, March 19th.

Seating is first-come, first-served and this venue fills up quickly so we'll take a place in line promptly at 7:00.

Click here for more information:

http://www.nohoarts.o...

Click here for CORRECT DIRECTIONS:

http://www.nohoarts.o...
item.how_to_find_us: Look for me inside the door....warmer there!
item.name: Northampton Dinner Dance
